nodes.text: Loovria was a planet in the Juvex sector of the Mid Rim along the Senex-Juvex Loop known for its gladiator pits.

It was on Loovria that jaded Senex and Juvex nobles-sometimes joined by rich, well connected outsiders-watched slaves and prisoners fight for their lives. Gladiators whose bravery caught the nobles' fancy were sometimes granted their freedom and showered with riches.
Slssk spent 10 years as a gladiator on Loovria. Quintik Kahr and his brother Omze'kehr Kahr were also gladiators on the planet for a time, as was the Anx known as the Great Goblin.
